description:
Fender up, bundle up and keep it going through the shoulder season. Winter's the time to get a jump on the competition. With a Select Thermal fabric for added warmth and moisture management, these winter tights keep your legs warm and spinning.

  • Select Thermal fabric provides a race ready fit with outstanding insulation and moisture management
  • Ankle zipper for a performance fit and a bit of room over your booties
  • Reflective elements for early morning hammering or into-the-night group rides
name: Pearl Izumi Sugar Thermal Tights - Women's
